p: Treatment and management of viral infections and TB includes prompt isolation of presumptive cases and of microbiologically confirmed cases depending on available resources, or even controlled release of prisoners [ 145]. This is part of the comprehensive strategy to mitigate transmission in nursing homes for the elderly, in refugee camps and in correctional facilities [ 146]. Prognosis of TB, SARS and COVID-19 tends to be worse, with higher mortality in the elderly [ 77, 138, 147].
